sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import "../Styling/Display.scss"; export class DisplayShift extends Component { render() { const localStorageData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("formValue")); const { startDate, startTime, endTime, repeatType, shiftValue, weekdayOnly, weekdays, } = localStorageData; const selectedWeekdays = weekdays.filter(item => item.value); return (
Start Date :
{startDate}
Select Repeat Type :
{repeatType}
Select Shift :
{shiftValue}
Select Start Time :
{startTime}
Select End Time :
{endTime}
Week Day :
{selectedWeekdays.map(item =>
{item.text}
)}
Week Day Only :
{weekdayOnly ? "Yes" : "No"}
); } } export default DisplayShift;
